name: Station Osirius
description:
Osirius Station - The State has lost contact with Osirius Station. You are assigned the task of recovering to the station and reporting what is going on there.

Embark on an exciting adventure full of adventure in the sci-fi game Station Osirius! Osirius is one of the remaining stations that survived the terrible catastrophe.

Explore dangerous locations in space, but be careful not only at the station! Destroy crowds of monsters and drones that will take the next path and consequences to destroy you. use all the weapons that reach it and fight back against this monster! Solve puzzles on your way and don't be afraid of traps!
